dict.acceptation: 明智的；合乎情理的；通情达理的；意识到的，能感觉到的；
可感觉到的东西；敏感的人；

sent.orig: The sensible thing -they had done the sensible thing.
sent.trans: 要讲实际嘛——他们正是这么做的。

sent.orig: It is hard to see any strong and sensible government emerging.
sent.trans: 至今还很难看到会出现一个强大而明智的政府。

sent.orig: He's behaved badly towards you, but a sensible person like you shouldn't want to take him up on it.
sent.trans: 他那样对待你是不对的，你别和他一般见识。

sent.orig: My wife has always been a sensible woman.
sent.trans: 我妻子一向都是很通情达理的。

sent.orig: Tough as it is, the only sensible way out is to let markets lead the way.
sent.trans: 虽然这会很艰难，但唯一明智的方法就是让市场来进行引导。
